import React from "react"; import Dropdown from "react-bootstrap/Dropdown"; import { BsPlayCircleFill as Play, BsFillPauseCircleFill as Pause, } from "react-icons/bs"; import { BiSkipNext as Next, BiSkipPrevious as Prev } from "react-icons/bi"; import { RiSpeedLine as Speed } from "react-icons/ri"; const AudioControls = ({ isPlaying, onPlayPauseClick, onPrevClick, onNextClick, showNextButton, changeSpeed, }) => (
{isPlaying ? ( ) : ( )} console.log(e.detail)} value="0.5"> 0.5 console.log(e)} value="1"> 1 console.log(e)} value="1.5"> 1.5 console.log(e)} value="2"> 2
); export default AudioControls;
